title: GenerateApiLibSources builder
description: Generate API lib source files via @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli

useDockerBuild.description: Should the build occur inside of a docker container

dockerImage.description: Which docker image should be used for the build?

generator.description: The OpenAPITools generator you want to use

additionalProperties.description: The additional properties you want to pass to the generator

globalProperties.description: The global properties you want to pass to the generator

typeMappings.description: What to map OpenAPI types to. E.g. DateTime to Date

sourceSpecPathOrUrl.description: The path (relative to the workspace root) or URL where the source OpenAPI spec file is located at

sourceSpecUrlAuthorizationHeaders.description: A URL-encoded string of name:header with a comma separating multiple values
